frontmatter.title: Coaching Tool: Waiting Room
frontmatter.description: Discover the 'Waiting Room' coaching tool for managing tasks outside your control and reducing anxiety. Learn how to visualize a mental waiting room for pending tasks, when to use it, and why this simple technique helps maintain focus on what truly matters right now.
